short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your chess passively with a puzzle on every new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Solve a chess tactics puzzle on every new tab and improve your tactical thinking passively. Each puzzle can be solved in a few seconds and the user can choose to ignore it. Furthermore the extension works offline so you can solve tactics puzzle online.
